title: Connection error
body: So league of legends was working fine last night, this morning i go to log on and it keeps telling me there was a error connecting. I tried running as admin, i restarted my internet, i restarted my computer, i changed my proxy settings, i checked the client status, and nothing is working. I am connected to internet and able to browse websites and connect to other online games.

replies.body:
UPDATE

REPAIRING LEAGUE OF LEGENDS WORKED!

I'm currently trying to repair League by clicking the "?" button that appears at the top right of the client when you first open league

Hopefully this works I guess
I just tried relogging without doing anything and it worked. :0 Maybe they fixed it?

Are you still seeing this issue? If so, there could be a number of problems with the Internet Explorer security settings that League relies on. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) to address them.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Sorry i know its been 3 days, i just did a repair on the client and it worked for me
